underlying_goal: Analyze a GitHub ticket (#337), review its latest comments, switch to the appropriate branch, and get a suggested fix for the reported issue
friction_detail: Claude failed to properly checkout the feature branch due to stash issues with locked files, remaining on 'live' instead of switching branches as requested.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to analyze ticket #337 and suggest a fix from the correct branch; Claude provided a good analysis but stumbled on the branch checkout, requiring user intervention to complete the switch.
